additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: AVOID SUDDEN TEMPERATURE CHANGES. DO NOT place hot glassware on wet or cool surface. Allow hot glassware to cool on a cooling rack, potholder or dry cloth. DO NOT use on or under a flame or other direct heat source. Add a small amount of liquid. DO NOT overheat oil or butter in microwave. Plastic lids are for microwave and storage use only, and are BPA free.

description: Store soups, sauces and salsa while doing good for the environment. The reusable PyrexÂ®1-Cup round glass dish saves waste from landfills as you fill your fridge with leftovers, and the BPA-free plastic lid does your family a favour while keeping foods fresh.
name: Simply Store Glass Round Container 950mL
